channel.title: Help. READ! and answer

item.title: Help. READ! and answer
item.dc:creator: @Yorchi_elite Yorchi elite
item.description:
@Yorchi_elite wrote:

Hello, i have this code for my make-over mage. Donator have free change of look but, if donator = 0. you have to pay 5000 Coins. can some help me.?

if(NPCID == 599){
if(donator == 1){
sM(“Chose a new char look.”);
showInterface(3559);
apset = true;
}
}
if(donator == 0){
sM(“I’m sorry i only help donators with there look”);
}

Read full topic
